latex:
Let $ U = 2\times2004^{2005}$, $ V = 2004^{2005}$, $ W = 2003\times2004^{2004}$, $ X = 2\times2004^{2004}$, $ Y = 2004^{2004}$ and $ Z = 2004^{2003}$. Which of the following is the largest?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\  U - V \qquad \textbf{(B)}\  V - W \qquad \textbf{(C)}\  W - X \qquad \textbf{(D)}\ X - Y \qquad \textbf{(E)}\ Y - Z$
